name: usgrn2cycl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c1, cfv(ccycls, c0), c2)), wne(cfv(chash, c1), nat2))

stmt.origin: syl2an(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c1, cfv(ccycls, c0), c2), wne(cfv(chash, c1), nat2), wcel(c0, cuspgr), wbr(c1, cfv(ccrcts, c0), c2))
stmt.pretty: syl2an(c0 ∈ USGraph, c1[(Cycles ` c0)]c2, (# ` c1)≠ 2, c0 ∈ USPGraph, c1[(Circuits ` c0)]c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(c1, cfv(ccycls, c0), c2)), wne(cfv(chash, c1), nat2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cuspgr))
-| wi(wbr(c1, cfv(ccycls, c0), c2), wbr(c1, cfv(ccrcts, c0), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wbr(c1, cfv(ccrcts, c0), c2)), wne(cfv(chash, c1), nat2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1[(Cycles ` c0)]c2)→(# ` c1)≠ 2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ USPGraph)
⊣ (c1[(Cycles ` c0)]c2 → c1[(Circuits ` c0)]c2)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ USPGraph ∧ c1[(Circuits ` c0)]c2)→(# ` c1)≠ 2)
